EmailTemplate.name: 6_1_Cold_Nurture_Client.6_1_Cold_Nurture_Client_Email_4
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing: Executive Dashboards
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/executive-dashboards-in-turbonomic-6-1/]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Users across the Turbonomic community have asked for a top-level view of their on-premises and cloud environments. We are proud to announce these views are now available thanks to the 6.1 release.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/executive-dashboards-in-turbonomic-6-1/]]>
These new views illustrate the value of the actions taken within Turbonomic. They help you gain the confidence of your operations teams, development teams, and business teams who are getting the benefit of increased workload performance, while safely increasing utilization of your hybrid infrastructure, and getting the most out of your cloud budget. See how <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/executive-dashboards-in-turbonomic-6-1/]]>.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
